profile.summary: In today's world of social and digital, I help enterprises make people their competitive advantage, thanks to 660+ million professionals on LinkedIn and their billions of interactions. Being a strategic business and talent partner, I deliver customer value and business outcomes for enterprises.
profile.headline: Sales Leader I HR Tech I Customer Success

experience.description: I lead a team of Customer Success Managers who drive the adoption, engagement and optimisation of  LinkedIn Learning solutions and LinkedIn Talent Solutions for Staffing clients
experience.title: Manager, Customer Success

experience.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest professional network with 800+ million members, with the mission to connect all the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful, by having them access to people, jobs, news, updates, and insights that help them be great at what they want to be.
Working with cross functional partners to drive adoption and usage of LinkedIn within client's
- Talent Acquisition
- L&D 
- Employee Engagement 
- Employment Branding
experience.title: Senior Enterprise Account Director

experience.description:
LinkedIn is the world's largest professional network with 645+ million members, with the mission to connect all the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful, by having them access to people, jobs, news, updates, and insights that help them be great at what they want to be.
Responsible for the post-sales success of LinkedIn's Talent Solutions Enterprise accounts, through strong relationship-building, product knowledge, and project management, leading to revenue growth and retention.
Driving customer growth through insights and ROI driven metrics.
Currently leading and mentoring SMB Relationship Managers to drive Customer Success and Business Growth.
experience.title: Enterprise Relationship Manager

experience.description: As a Relationship Manager I help my customers effectively engage with the LinkedIn network by effectively utilizing our hiring solutions.  Am focussed on providing my clients a solution that solves their recruitment needs and enable them to make better strategic decisions and be successful. Help clients build EVP and Employee Advocacy. Customer Success is my top most priority by ensuring all the corporate clients that I manage see value and improved business results by leveraging our LinkedIn Talent Solutions.
experience.title: Corporate Relationship Manager

experience.description: In my role as a Senior Consultant I was managing the Top Enterprise Portfolio for the West Region. My role was to increase Social Recruiting Awareness and Adoption across Top Enterprise clients. Sharing Best Practices and ensuring customer success and delight. Help client build roadmap for LinkedIn Adoption and define success matrix, by aligning Business and Talent Acquisition priorities. Did multiple LinkedIn Profile makeover & Branding workshops for Senior Leaders. Managed and run Informed Session (1:many) across India. Onboarding and Mentoring New Team members.
experience.title: Senior Customer Success Consultant - Top Enterprise

certifications.name: Transitioning from Individual Contributor to Manager
Becoming Head of Sales: Developing Your Playbook

honors.description: LinkedIn President's Club Award, which is given only to the top 10% performers of the company for achievements in this fiscal year, globally.
honors.title: Club Qualifier - FY 21

honors.description: For being the "Incredible Backbone" to the LinkedIn India Relationship Management Team and creating a huge Business Impact
honors.title: Most Valuable Player - 2014
